text:
I'm sure you know how much an invitation of this
stature must mean to one who looks forward to a career in
educational radio and television. It goes without saying
how much I appreciate the good words that someone must have
put in for me. From this point I'll try to do as well as
our Texas politicians and "stand on my record".
GRA/rg
Enclosure
Gale R. Adkins
Acting Director of Radio-TV
University of Texas
